name: Endless Basement
description:
This is my first experience with RPG Maker.

I am still experimenting new stuff so a lot more stages will be added as time goes on.

Any of your feedback is appreciated!

Download link for Windows

Controls:

- Movement: Arrow Keys

- Select: Z/Left Click

- Menu: X/Right Click

- Dash: Shift

Credits:

- VisuMZ Plugins by Team VisuStella
